News    Prof. Joseph Foudy on China's economic growth  — January 17, 2015                         Excerpt from CNC World -- "So it's really time for China to sort of think about what is the quality of growth. And I think anything in the 5 to 7 percent range is actually quite healthy as long as the economy is reforming, moving to a consumption-based economy and moving to an innovation-based economy. So I think it's good news."
